thread.title: Trump asks who won the debate, Schilling says ISIS
thread.title_full: Trump asks who won the debate, Schilling says ISIS - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Trump asks who won the debate, Schilling says ISIS
text:
Elsa/Getty Images Curt Schilling gets political again Tuesday night by tweeting that ISIS won the Democratic debate. Curt Schilling hasn’t been on the mound in years, but he’s still making noise in October.
The ESPN baseball analyst — who was booted from the network’s broadcast booth after comparing Muslims to Nazis in tweets in August — got political once again on Tuesday night, this time with none other than Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump.
When Trump, who live-tweeted the Democratic debate , asked followers who was winning and Schilling was quick to chime in.
“ISIS,” the former All-Star pitcher tweeted.
Oh, boy.
Schilling was pulling double duty on Twitter Tuesday night, and the “stick to sports” crowd will be happy to know that Schilling also found time to chime in on the NLDS.
“Feels like Kershaw getting better, stronger #ace,” he tweeted as Clayton Kershaw was mowing down the Mets.
That’s the kind of analysis only a former player can provide.
